product.name: Golf Outing Sponsorship
product.description:
For our second year as The Forge, we hope to provide our best golf outing to date. We are only as successful as our participants and our sponsors, however! We have some new options available and even custom sponsoring to meet the needs of you or your business.

*The Pittsburgh Forge is considered a non-profit with a 501c3 designation, so sponsorship could be written off as a charitable donation.

Questions? - Email: n.beswick14@gmail.com

Email company logo or image to: pghforgerugby@gmail.com

Custom Sponsorship - None of the above tiers catch your interest but still want to participate? We are happy to work with you and/or your business to come up with a sponsorship that works for you! Sponsor a specific hole with an event (last year we did dizzy bat!), sponsor breakfast, donate a raffle basket, even sponsor the beer!

We also accept Venmo(@pghrugby), and cash/check mailed to Pittsburgh Forge. If you would like to sponsor via one of these methods please contact us AND fill out the form below.

Please fill out registration form by clicking here if you would like to pay outside of the website.

product_variations.description: •    One (1) sign in Clubhouse at breakfast or dinner table
•    Logo of your choice on two (2) golf carts

We are happy to work with you and/or your business to come up with a sponsorship that works for you! Sponsor a specific hole with an event (last year we did dizzy bat!), sponsor breakfast, donate a raffle basket, even sponsor the beer!

•    2 Hole Signage
•    One (1) complimentary non-drink ticket team member ($100 value)

•    Signage at all 4 Contest Hole’s
•    One (1) complimentary non-drink ticket team member ($100 value)*

•    Table signage at both meals
•    Signage at 2 Hole’s
•    One (1) complimentary non-drink ticket Twosome ($185 value)*

•    Signage in Clubhouse for duration of event
•    One (1) complimentary non-drink ticket Twosome ($185 value)*

•    Name and logo on promotional item of your choosing (Payment due 9/1/19)
•    Signage in Clubhouse for duration of event
•    One (1) complimentary non-drink ticket Foursome ($350 value)*

•    Name and logo on all branding, marketing, promotions (Payment due 9/1/19)
•    Signage in Clubhouse for duration of event
•    Two (2) complementary non-drink ticket Foursomes ($750 value)*
